headline: The FBI searched the Maryland home and D.C. office of former Trump national security adviser John Bolton, escalating a years-old probe into whether the Trump critic mishandled classified information
Russia’s top diplomat says Zelensky can’t sign Ukraine war peace deal because he’s ‘illegitimate’
When President Trump called Gavin Newsom “Newscum” earlier this year, the California governor likened him to a bully and refused to engage. These days, Newsom is starting to act as the aggressor.
Russia’s foreign minister throws up a new condition for any Putin-Zelensky summit: ‘There is no meeting planned’

Canada’s decision to drop tariffs on most U.S. imports could give the country’s central bank a freer hand in cutting interest rates because the threat of trade-related inflation has dissipated, economists say
Israel says it will begin Gaza City military takeover in mid-September: report
Lyle Menendez denied parole in parents' 1989 murder a day after brother Erik also rejected
The GOP’s redistricting push in Texas hinges on newly-red Hispanic voters continuing to vote Republican. But there are signs that their support for the Trump agenda has faded.
President Trump has ordered the Pentagon to send three Navy warships to interdict drug cartels off the coast of South America, including near Venezuela
President Trump and his allies are waging a caustic, unprecedented campaign to pressure Fed Chair Jerome Powell into cutting interest rates. Powell is trying to keep his cool in the hot seat.
